name: Jessica Mystery of Courchevel
description:
Jessica Mystery of Courchevel is a classic hidden object game with a gripping storyline and lots of minigames. This time Jessica has to go to a winter ski resort.

This time tireless and irrepressible adventurer Jessica goes to the Alps with her boyfriend Tony to have some rest at the famous ski resort. But on the first day Tony was arrested and faced charges of kidnapping the dog. Police has refused to disclose any details citing the confidentiality and then Jessica secretly enters the police station and successfully frees Tony from the cell. Our heroes have little time to investigate the kidnapping, because when police discover the Tony’s escape, the chances of successful outcome of the case will evaporate…

- New adventures of the famous heroine from the popular computer games series – resourceful and savvy girl Jessica
- 10 locations, including the den of the mysterious kidnapper
- Lots of mysteries in the hidden object genre and more than 10 additional mini-games (maze, tag game, puzzle, etc.)
- Tense detective story in an atmosphere of the luxurious ski resort
